raw: Lak a The bhinese Student Compere . Trenity tollege i Hartford Coun ii Cusast 1910. | Phällips 1956 r Andon, Myklear Nur Steam I came to Hartford three days ago for the coming students Conference. Before that time I had been studying English 4 Machamaties in Boston under prevate tutors far att about the moutes for this reason I had spent more money this summer than 2 déd My finance is now a title at a shortager

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter from Sung Sing Kwan stating that because he took classes in English and mathematics in Boston with private tutors, his finances are depleted. He requests $50 for expenses for the conference.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
